dict.acceptation: 在…设置路障；（狗）沿臭迹追逐（猎物）；（狗）闻着臭迹追；

sent.orig: Road, milk Chalmers Road, Wai Man Road, industrial road communication between North and South East region.
sent.trans: 新华路、乳韶路、惠民路、工业大路沟通区内东西南北。

sent.orig: Various terrain and road condition, including off-the-road and wet road.
sent.trans: 适应于各种地形和路况设计、越野行驶起伏路况行驶湿路行驶（请理顺中文！）

sent.orig: Road with a sharp curve. Attach to other road segments to create road layouts.
sent.trans: 有急弯道的道路。连接到其他路段，以创建道路布局图。

sent.orig: Road with a gentle curve. Attach to other road segments to create road layouts.
sent.trans: 有缓弯道的道路。连接到其他路段，以创建道路布局图。

sent.orig: Ma Pei Road to the main road network around the township, every village had a road.
sent.trans: 以裴麻公路为主的道路网络遍布全乡，村村通了公路。
